attributes.action: Sack 2 Jags Prescott and NOT elevate him to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE MAN HAS BEEN A COSTLY LIABILITY SINCE THE 1997 ELECTION. BLAIR HAS ONLY KEPT HIM ON AS A SOP TO THE OLD 'LEFT' OF HIS PARTY AND EVERYTHING HE HAS EVER DONE HAS BEEN A COSTLY FAILURE. JUST STOP PAYING HIM OUT OF MY TAXES. WE COULD HAVE BUILT A FEW HOSPITALS WITH WHAT HE HAS COST US. ALSO DO NOT ELEVATE HIM TO THE HOUSE OF LORDS
